attention3.ptxt: Do not clamp yoke in a vise or strike it with a hammer during repair operations.

s1.ptxt: Loosen magnetic switch screw (1) and then remove front housing (2).
Put match marks (1) on magnetic switch (2) and planetary carrier shaft assembly (3) to install the magnetic switch correctly in position.
Loosen magnetic switch inner screw (4) and then remove magnetic switch (2) and spring (5).

attention2.ptxt: Don’t disassemble this switch. If defective, replace as a complete assembly.

s1.ptxt: Remove pin (1) and then remove from lever (2) and then plunger / lever assembly.
Remove planetary carrier shaft assembly (1) from yoke (2).

attention2.ptxt: Don’t disassemble motor. If defective, replace as a complete assembly.

s1.ptxt: Loosen pinion stop ring (2) fixed by snap ring (1).
Remove snap ring and then pull out pinion stop ring (1) and over-running clutch (2) from planetary carrier shaft (3).
Install over-running clutch (1) to planetary carrier shaft (3), using care for installing direction of pinion stop ring (2).
Install planetary carrier shaft assembly (1) to yoke (2).
Install lever (2) to planetary carrier shaft assembly (3) and then insert pin (1).
Install spring (5) and magnetic switch (2) to plunger and then tighten magnetic switch inner screw (4).

attention2.ptxt: With marks (1) on magnetic switch (2) and planetary carrier shaft assembly (3) marked before remove aligned to each other.

s1.ptxt: Install front housing (2) and then tighten magnetic switch screw (1).
Install through bolts (2) and then tighten through bolts.
